alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:55PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Patricio, south central Goliad, west central Refugio and southeastern Bee Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 755 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blanconia, or 13 miles northeast of Skidmore, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Skidmore, Papalote and Blanconia. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 604 and 612. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Goliad; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
